comment: corn, faint orange rind, simple syrup and rock candy.
The first bottle of this was excellent, similar to Makers. My second, less so - much harsher, burn. Inconsistent.
Solid drink. Reminds me of bulleit

Better than I expected. Vanilla oak up front that mellows. No smoke but taste the wood. For the proof there's a lot of sweetness but not much depth after that as the thinness washes away without much flavor. Bulleit mixed with Maker's profile of sweetness. Quick finish.

A little harsh for me, but not bad overall. I picked it up as my family is from Connecticut, otherwise I’m not sure I would have grabbed this one. Ultimately, I’m happy to have this as part of the collection.
Silky smooth. Not at all harsh.  Sweet aftertaste.  Beware, proof is 100.
